xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Diretório de Divisões platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Remover platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=Divisões
## Dependencies platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=O componente java do Gerenciador de Divisões não está instalado. Esta página não funcionará corretamente. Verifique se o arquivo 'wiki30-components-workspace-manager-<version>.jar' está presente no diretório 'webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/'. ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).
## Create ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.button=Create Wiki platform.wiki.create.title=Criar uma nova divisão platform.wiki.create.members=MEMBROS platform.wiki.create.prettyname.empty=Nome de exibição não pode ser vazio platform.wiki.create.error=Criação da divisão "{0}" falhou\: {1}. platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.databasealreadyexists=Uma base de dados com esse identificador já existe platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.wikialreadyexists=Esse identificador já foi usado platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.empty=O identificador não pode ser vazio
## Common errors and messages platform.wiki.error.wikidoesnotexist=Divisão [{0}] não existe platform.wiki.error.oneParameterNotSpecified=O parâmetro ''{0}'' não foi informado. platform.wiki.error.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Mais de um valor aceito. platform.wiki.error.exceptionWithMessage=Exceção\: {0} platform.wiki.form.requiredField=Obrigatório ### Missing: platform.wiki.csrf.error=Invalid security token. Please retry your operation.
## Users platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=O usuário {0}{1}{2} já é membro da divisão {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=O usuário {0}{1}{2} não é membro da divisão {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=Para continuar você precisa {0}entrar{1}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=O usuário ''{0}'' ({1}) aceitou o convite para entrar na divisão ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=O usuário {0}{1}{2} aceitou o convite e entrou na divisão {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=O usuário {0}{1}{2} rejeitou o convite para entrar na Wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=Essa Wiki é só para usuários registrados. Para entrar você deve receber um convite de um de seus administradores. platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=O usuário {0}{1}{2} já tem uma solicitação pendente para entrar na divisão {3}{4}{5}. Por favor espere até que do admin possa revisá-la. platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Você tem certeza que deseja cancelar a solicitação para entrar na divisão {3}{4}{5}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Sim platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=Não platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=O usuário {0}{1}{2} cancelou com sucesso a solicitação para entrar na Wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=O usuário ''{0}'' ({1}) solicitou entrar na divisão ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=O usuário {0}{1}{2} enviou com sucesso a solicitação para entrar na Wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Você tem certeza que deseja entrar nesta Wiki{0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Sim platform.wiki.users.join.no=Não platform.wiki.users.join.success=O usuário {0}{1}{2} entrou com sucesso na divisão {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=O usuário {0}{1}{2} é o dono da divisão {3}{4}{5}. O dono não pode sair até que a divisão seja removida ou o dono seja alterado. platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Você tem certeza que deseja sair da divisão {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Sim platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=Não platform.wiki.users.leave.success=O usuário {0}{1}{2} saiu com sucesso da Wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.title=Entrar na Divisão platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Sair da Divisão "{0}" platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Remover Divisão "{0}" ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.delete.empty=Delete Wiki platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=Uma resposta para enviar, visualizada pelo administrador da divisão, na qual você pode explicar sua decisão. platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=Para entrar na divisão {0}{1}{2} você deve primeiro fazer uma solicitação. Então, um administrador da divisão vai revisar sua solicitação e aceitá-la ou rejeitá-la. platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=Uma mensagem para o administrador da Wiki na qual você pode explicar porque deseja entrar. platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=Você foi convidado para entrar na Divisão {0}{1}{2}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Mensagem de convite platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Responder platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Aceitar platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Rejeitar ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Later ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Message ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Send Request ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Back

This action cannot be reverted! ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.retypeWikiId=Please repeat the identifier of the wiki here: ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.error.wikiIdDoesNotMatch=Type in the exact Wiki Identifier of the wiki that should be deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully deleted the wiki ''{3}''.

## Wizard ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=The domain name that will point to the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Template to use for this new wiki (all pages will be cloned). ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=A user who will always have all the rights on this wiki, independent of the rights configured in the Administration. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=The users who can participate in the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Step 1 — Choose a name platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Nome ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Step 2 — Choose members ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Cleaning Up ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Clean & delete this wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=The wiki {0} has been successfuly deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Error, the wiki {0} has not been deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=You are about to delete wiki {0}. Please confirm. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Confirm ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=This wiki will be a template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=No template (default) ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=User Scope ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Select what kind of users can access the wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Flavor / Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Flavor or Template to use as the initial content of the new wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Flavor ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=After clicking on the "Create" button, the wiki will be created and the Distribution Wizard will be started in order to help you initialize your wiki. If you skip the wizard, your wiki will be empty. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Previous Step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Next step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Create
### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki creation ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Please wait until the wiki is created. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=The wiki {0} has been successfully created. You can now access it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.errorlog=However, error(s) have been generated during that process and you might want to review them. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=The creation of the wiki {0} failed. It''s recommended to delete it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.go=Go to the wiki
## Admin ### Missing: admin.wikis.description=Wikis management. ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates=Wiki Templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. ### Missing: admin.wikis.rights=Creation Right
## XWikiServer Sheet ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title=Descriptor of the wiki \"{0}\" ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasalreadynotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" already exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasdoesnotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" does not exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.settings=Wiki properties platform.wiki.sheet.title.createnewalias=Criar novo apelido ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.viewaliases=View aliases ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.secure=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with \"https\". ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.port=The port to use for all this wiki's generated externals URLs. If not set it's inherited from the configuration and the main wiki. Only taken into account for domain based URLs. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.iswikitemplate=Indicate if this wiki can be used as a template when creating a new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.server=The alias used to access the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.description=A brief wiki description. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.homepage=The homepage of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.wikiprettyname=Pretty name platform.wiki.sheet.prop.owner=Dono ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.secure=Secure (SSL) ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.port=Port ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.description=Description ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.server=Alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.homepage=Homepage ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.iswikitemplate=Wiki template ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor=This page defines how to access the \"{0}\" wiki, and some properties about it. For more configurations, please go to the ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=administration page of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.
